title: Set Contact page hero section background image with dark dimmed overlay (full-bleed)

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image file `pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg` to the frontend as a static asset (e.g., under `frontend/public/`) and use it as the background image for the selected Contact page section at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]` (the first `<section>` in `frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx`, currently the “Hero Section”).

quotes: Use this image for the background of this (selected section) for the contact page.
The user has uploaded 3 image(s): pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg, pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882-1.jpg, pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882-2.jpg.
Just one *I uploaded more by mistake

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page hero section (first `<section>` in `ContactPage.tsx`) renders with `pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg` as its background.
The other two uploaded duplicate images are not used by the UI.

requirements.text: Update the selected Contact page hero section to be full-bleed with the background image covering the entire section (responsive `cover` behavior, centered), and add a dark dimmed overlay layer above the image but behind the text to ensure readability and visual blending with the site theme.

quotes: Make sure the image blends well with the text and style and theme of the website. Maybe you can work around the opacity or dimness but make it visually pleasing

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile and desktop, the background image fills the entire hero section area without tiling or stretching artifacts (uses a cover-like behavior).
A dark dimming overlay is visible over the background image, and hero text remains clearly readable (sufficient contrast).
The overlay does not affect layout or interactivity of hero content (text remains selectable/clickable as expected).

requirements.text: Keep the existing hero content (heading “Book Now”, accent divider, and description text) visually consistent with the current website styling while applying the new background/overlay (no copy changes; only visual/styling changes to the selected section).

quotes: Make sure the image blends well with the text and style and theme of the website.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero title, divider, and description copy remain unchanged.
No visual regressions are introduced to non-selected sections of the Contact page (e.g., the contact form section styles remain the same).

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected section (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]`) on the Contact page.
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only components must be composed, not modified).
Backend remains single-actor Motoko; no backend changes are required for this styling update.
nonGoals: Do not implement new contact form behavior, validation rules, or backend submission.
Do not redesign other sections of the Contact page beyond ensuring the hero section background/overlay blends with the existing theme.
Do not add a carousel or slideshow to the Contact page hero; use only one image as specified.
